thread.title: Netflix Has Answered Your Prayers And Picked Up 'The OA' Part II
thread.title_full: Netflix Has Answered Your Prayers And Picked Up 'The OA' Part II

author: Cole Delbyck
title: Netflix Has Answered Your Prayers And Picked Up 'The OA' Part II
text:
Netflix Has Answered Your Prayers And Picked Up 'The OA' Part II **Uncontrollably starts doing the Movements** 02/08/2017 11:21 am ET Cole Delbyck Entertainment Writer, The Huffington Post Netflix Finally. 
Name another series in 2016 that was more divisive than “ The OA .” Go ahead, we’ll wait. 
Ever since the trippy sci-fi series wrapped up its first season with a polarizing final twist that called everything we thought we knew into question ― (SPOILER ALERT) was Prairie lying about everything ? ― fans have been clamoring for more answers. 
Netflix officially announced that the series would return for a Season 2 , titled “Part II,” at a press event and in a release on Wednesday, but didn’t go as far to give a timeframe for when to expect new episodes. 
“The OA” debuted on the streaming service in mid-December with eight episodes following the adventures of Prairie Johnson (Brit Marling), a once-missing blind girl who returns to her home town after years with her sight restored. Batshit craziness ensues. 
Now, let’s celebrate. 2016 Movies Available On Netflix 2016 Movies Available On Netflix 1 12 "The Jungle Book" Hollywood's bloated franchise obsession is running thin , but Disney's live-action reboots of its animated classics keep getting better. 2016 brought us "The Jungle Book" and "Pete's Dragon," two surprisingly meditative takes on orphan boys surviving in the wilderness with their animal pals. Netflix recently signed a deal to acquire Disney's new releases, so "The Jungle Book" has already hit the streaming service. Boot up Jon Favreau's majestic adventure -- featuring the voice work of Idris Elba, Lupita Nyong'o, Scarlett Johansson and Christopher Walken -- for a beautifully rendered take on the bare necessities of life.
